short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See your 42 intra log hours per month

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some students specially scholarship holders want to have a track of their log hours per month. 42hours is an extension that shows the amount of log time per each month on the 42 network intra profile of the user.

It is open-source so feel free to make or mention any kind of improvement on github.com/rtcq/42hours.
